description: man with a gaunt face at the left side of the image in a suit and tie looking at the viewer; on the right side of the image an oval cosmetic mirror on a stand reflects the man's face in profile
inscription: LRC in plate: W.G. 19. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E.135 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2320 | URC of sheet in pencil, on verso: No 15
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 19. | LL in pencil, below image: Der Mann am Spiegel.
title: The Man at the Mirror
